name: Classic TV Actors in Movie Roles Online Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Norman Fell was fine in his comedic role as Mr. Roper in "Three's Company" - but he also turned in fine dramatic performances. Which movie included him in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Bullitt.

	He plays a hard-nosed cop. Nice job. John Banner ("Hogan's Heroes") has a small role in "36 Hours" - again as a German soldier. Werner Klemperer (also from "Hogan") plays a prionser in "Nuremberg".

questions.text: Similarly, Jack Klugman was great as Oscar Madison in "The Odd Couple", but he also turned in many fine performances in serious roles. Which movie included him in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Goodbye, Columbus.

	He plays Ali MacGraw's father. "Cement" is a Frank Sinatra movie that includes Dan Blocker ("Bonanza") in the cast - as a heavy. "Rain" features Jackie Gleason.

questions.text: Alan Hale (Jr.) was easygoing in "Gilligan's Island". Which movie does NOT include him in the cast?
options: Hale is in all three movies
questions.explanation:
The Far Horizons.

	He's a suitor in the Frank Sinatra/Doris Day "Young at Heart" and he's a member of the hanging party in "Hang 'em High". Barbara Hale (of "Perry Mason") - not Alan - has a role in "Horizons", which stars Fred MacMurray and Richard Widmnark as Lewis and Clark. (Donna Reed also appears as Sacajawea.)

questions.text: Alan Alda starred in "Jenny" before "MASH" became a huge hit. Which actress - better known for tv than for movies - played the title role?
questions.explanation:
Marlo Thomas.

	Thomas is best known for "That Girl"  - but this was before she hit with that show.

questions.text: Which tv detective was in the cast of the Jack Lemmon movie "Good Neighbor Sam".
questions.explanation:
Mike Connors.

	Lemmon, Connors, Dorothy Provine and Romy Schneider are the two couples that head the cast.

questions.text: Whic tv comedienne was in the cast of "Thoroughly Modern Millie"?
questions.explanation:
Mary Tyler Moore.

	A Julie Andrews film - in the interval between Laura Petrie and Mary Richards.

questions.text: Which actor had a small role in the Orson Welles' "Touch of Evil"?
questions.explanation:
Dennis Weaver.

	Weaver starred in "Gunsmoke" and "McCloud".

questions.text: An actor from this tv series appeared in the classic "High Noon".
questions.explanation:
Sea Hunt.

	Lloyd Bridges played in "Sea Hunt". "Hammer" was Darren McGavin. "M" was Lee Marvin. "Gun" was Richard Boone

questions.text: A member of what tv series is in the cast of "Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?"
questions.explanation:
The Jeffersons.

	Isabel Sanford plays a maid with an attitude.

questions.text: Which of these movies does NOT include Ted Danson ("Cheers") in the cast?
questions.correct: Tell Them Willie Boy Is Here
options: Danson is in all three movies
questions.explanation:
Tell Them Willie Boy Is Here.

	He's a cop in "Onion Field" and a prosecutor in "Body Heat". "Willie" has Robert Blake ("Barretta") in the cast.
